title: Frank Ocean’s Father Suing Him for Defamation: Report
text:
19 mins ago Frank Ocean’s Father Suing Him for Defamation: Report Calvin Cooksey says Ocean’s claim that he used a gay slur has cost him “financial opportunities” Frank Ocean Photo by Jason Kempin/Getty Images 
Frank Ocean has been hit with a defamation lawsuit by his father, Calvin Cooksey, TMZ reports. Cooksey filed the lawsuit in response to a note that Ocean posted last summer on his Tumblr in the aftermath of the Orlando nightclub shooting. “I was six years old when I heard my dad call our transgender waitress a faggot as he dragged me out a neighborhood diner saying we wouldn’t be served because she was dirty,” the note reads. It continues, “That was the last afternoon I saw my father and the first time I heard that word, I think, although it wouldn’t shock me if it wasn’t.” 
According to Cooksey, the story is untrue, and has “damaged his financial opportunities in film and music.” He’s suing his son for $14.5 million in damages. In 2014, Cooksey sued Russell Simmons for nearly ten times that amount, also over defamation charges. Pitchfork has reached out to representatives for Ocean for comment. Artists In This Story
